summary: Another entry into my Customizer series for Followers! This customizer enables you to customize the appearance of Vivace by rxkx22. This customizer enables you to change her body textures / meshes and her eyes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][center][size=6][/size][/center][font=Verdana][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img921/1013/DE3giz.png[/img][/center][center][b][i][size=3][color=#e69138]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]https://imageshack.com/a/img924/1402/x3ny5B.jpg[/img][/url][/color]

[color=#93c47d]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/color][/size][/i][/b]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Vivace looks. You can change the body textures, face and eyes.[/size][/center]

[center][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68976/?]Vivace Follower[/url][/size][/center]Made for V1.1 (Will also work on V1.1.2)
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img][/center][center][color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]meshes\actors\character\Vivace[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy all the files to [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\[i][color=#6aa84f]actors\character\Vivace[/color][/i][/color][/i]. The eyes goes into [i][color=#6aa84f]textures\[/color][i][color=#6aa84f]actors\character\Vivace\eyes[/color].[/i][/i]
[/size][/center]
[center][color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40156/?]UNPC Body v2dot5[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35748/?]UNPetite[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel[/url][/i][/size]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body/Face Texture[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Texture Renewal[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature Skin Texture[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?]Real Girls[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4686/?]CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]Women of Skyrim[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586]Pride of Valhalla[/url][/i][/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=5]Eyes[/size][/color]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]True Eyes[/url][/i][/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=5]Etc[/size][/color][size=3]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37022/?]FemFeet Redesigned[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49285/?]Feminine Hands[/url][/size][/center]

[center]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/19333159/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/3659/qItycv.png[/img][/url][/center][/font][/center]
author: ClearanceClarence

files.name: Vivace Customizer - CBBE - 1.1.0
files.changelogHtml:
Reduced filesize with 50% thanks to new compression algorithm
Fixed issue in SevenBase installer where selecting Natural would result in Original being installed
Added Demoniac v1.01 FMS
Many small tweaks in the installer to make it more reliable
Updated various textures

files.name: Vivace Customizer - CBBE - 1.2
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to the latest version of the framework
Removed SecenBase (Install UNP and overwrite meshes if you still want it)
Added Pride of Valhalla textures
A ton of small updates and tweaks since the last update was over 2 years ago
